description:
Title: Nikitich and Dragon
Publication Type: License .
Genre: Quest , Action .
Developer : PIPE Studio.
Year: 2006
Platform: PC

Language: Russian only .
Tablet: Not required .

System requirements: - Operating system: Windows 95/98 / ME / 2000 / XP
- CPU Pentium III 500 MHz (better - Pentium III 900 MHz)
- 64 MB (better - 128 MB) of RAM
- Video card with 32 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX and supports 800x600 screen resolution with a color depth of 16 bits / pixel
- Sound card compatible with DirectX
- DirectX 8.0a
- Device for reading DVD
- 2.5 GB of free hard disk space
- Keyboard and mouse

Installation Instructions :

1. Run "Dobrynya_setup.exe".
2 . Install.
3 . Play .


Description: Along with the mighty hero Dobrynya and savvy partner Elisha you go into this game to meet the new amazing adventure in a bright and unique world of ancient fairy tales . The task before you is daunting to stand - to rescue his niece from the clutches of the Kyiv Prince as much of the Snake Dragon ! But one knows until you nor good fellows that really crafty prince has no interest in returning home beauties Fun ...
Distinctive features of the game

    New adventure game from the creators of the famous game "Alyosha Popovich Tugarin Serpent"
    Have many interesting puzzles and arcade fun episodes
    Bright colorful characters - as already familiar cartoon and hitherto have not seen before
    Luscious graphics , great music and dynamic animation from the studio "Mill" <a href="
